attributes.10: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Urzen's background is the same. He is among the ironborn who raid the Stony Shore and part of the force that captures Winterfell. '''Urzen''' is a background character in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He is played by an unidentified extra and debuts in "[[The Ghost of Harrenhal]]" though first identified in "[[Valar Morghulis]]". Urzen is an [[ironborn]] raider and member of the ''[[Sea Bitch]]'' crew. He takes part in the [[Fall of Winterfell|seizing]] of [[Winterfell]] during the [[War of the Five Kings]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
Urzen is present when [[Theon Greyjoy]] gives a speech encouraging his crew to resist the Northmen led by [[Ramsay Snow]] and die a glorious death.<ref>"[[Valar Morghulis]]"</ref>
